p: By comparing the coverages of the candidate HGT regions ( Table S6), we also clarified that there was no significant difference between coverage of these regions and the genome as a whole. Furthermore, the coverage of the virus was about 8000X in both prepared libraries, while the coverage of the host genome was below 10X. For both the Daisy approach and this independent coverage analysis, we used the full read dataset rather than the read subsets, which did not initially map to the D. magna genome.
